bug.author: jlewi
bug.summary: Test Flake; basic auth connection reset connecting to master
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_kubeflow/3479/kubeflow-presubmit/1141521560461381632/>https://prow.k8s.io/view/gcs/kubernetes-jenkins/pr-logs/pull/kubeflow_kubeflow/3479/kubeflow-presubmit/1141521560461381632/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>util.py 71 INFO Error: couldn't apply KfApp: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: kfApp Apply failed for kustomize@0caa70b451 8859c0678d0d0e12c11a7e35345c5a: (kubeflow.error): Code 500 with message: couldn't create resources from /mnt/test-data-volume/kubeflow-presubmit-kfctl-go -basic-auth-3479-e2d0bc5-1632-3889/kfctl-3889/kustomize/istio-install.yaml Error: Post https://35.231.128.61/apis/rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1/clusterrole s: read tcp 10.36.254.212:57360->35.231.128.61:443: read: connection reset by peer </denchmark-code>
Filing this bug to tack this flake
